title: Tomb Raiser Zombie

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Place a grave outside a player's house.

> Once per game, summon a Zombie NPC for every non-broken grave.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Graves give one level of defense (Vulnerable > None > Basic > Powerful > Invincible > Overprotective).

> Graves **can** stack.

> Graves last until destroyed.

> Whenever a player with a grave is attacked, the level of the attack determines how many graves are broken. (Basic breaks 1 grave, Powerful breaks 2 graves, etc.)

> Each grave destroyed lowers the level of the attack (An Unstoppable attack that breaks 2 graves is now a Basic attack.)

> If a player dies, all graves on them are destroyed.

> Zombie NPCs are NPC's named Grave Zombie. Grave Zombies are controlled by the Zombies and are all given a random weak zombie role (host decides what roles are considered weak).

> After 1 day-night cycle, all Grave Zombies are ran over by a lawnmower and die.
